profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes MLOps, including CI/CD, model deployment, maintenance, and productionization of ML models. While GenAI is mentioned, the core responsibilities and focus on reusable templates and production-grade ML systems align more closely with the ML Engineer profile.

phrases.phrase: translate the technical needs of the Data science team to appropriate templates that fit within our generalized Model Factory platform
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates understanding the needs of the data science team (business context for model development) and translating them into actionable platform requirements.

phrases.phrase: consult the Model Factory team on best practices when it comes to MLOps and its implementation
phrases.justification: This involves understanding and communicating best practices, which requires a grasp of the broader MLOps landscape and its application.

phrases.phrase: Provide support in aligning the tech stack with architectural requirements in collaboration with Solution architects and IT4IT engineers
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of how technical solutions fit within broader architectural and business requirements.

job_tasks.justification: While data is fundamental to ML, the description does not explicitly detail tasks related to building or maintaining data pipelines, cleaning, preprocessing, or feature engineering. The focus is on the operationalization of models.

phrases.phrase: Responsible for batch, real-time and GenAI model deployments
phrases.justification: This implies involvement in the deployment aspect of various model types, including generative AI, which is a form of model adaptation and deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The role mentions 'GenAI model deployments' and 'AI Models (MARS, Gen AI & New use cases)', indicating some interaction with the modeling lifecycle, specifically around deployment and potentially retraining.

phrases.phrase: Create and manage reusable deployment templates for ML models
phrases.justification: Creating templates for deployment involves software development practices to ensure reusability and standardization.

phrases.phrase: Implement security concerns related to ML systems with the Solution architect and IT teams
phrases.justification: Implementing security involves developing or integrating security measures into the ML systems, which is a software development task.

phrases.phrase: Tech Stack Alignment: Provide support in aligning the tech stack with architectural requirements
phrases.justification: This involves understanding and potentially contributing to the software architecture and technology choices for ML systems.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating reusable templates, implementing security, and aligning tech stacks, which are software development activities focused on the ML infrastructure and deployment.

phrases.phrase: Senior Machine Learning Ops Engineer
phrases.justification: The job title itself explicitly states MLOps.

phrases.phrase: working with the Model Factory team (platform team)
phrases.justification: This indicates a focus on the platform and infrastructure supporting ML models, a core MLOps concern.

phrases.phrase: translate the technical needs of the Data science team to appropriate templates that fit within our generalized Model Factory platform
phrases.justification: This involves creating standardized deployment processes and infrastructure, a key MLOps responsibility.

phrases.phrase: consult the Model Factory team on best practices when it comes to MLOps and its implementation
phrases.justification: Directly involves advising on and implementing MLOps best practices.

phrases.phrase: IT Security & Compliance: Implement security concerns related to ML systems
phrases.justification: Ensuring security and compliance for ML systems in production is a critical MLOps function.

phrases.phrase: Create and manage reusable deployment templates for ML models
phrases.justification: Developing standardized deployment mechanisms is a core MLOps task.

phrases.phrase: Support Deployments: Collaborate with data scientists during model deployment
phrases.justification: Directly involved in the process of getting models into production.

phrases.phrase: Maintenance: Maintain ML models in production (i.e. retraining, monitoring health and ensuring service availability)
phrases.justification: These are classic MLOps responsibilities for ensuring models perform reliably in production.

phrases.phrase: CI/CD Implementation & Orchestration: Implement continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines and streamline deployment workflows
phrases.justification: This is a fundamental aspect of MLOps, focusing on automating the deployment lifecycle.

phrases.phrase: Responsible for batch, real-time and GenAI model deployments
phrases.justification: Managing the deployment of various types of models in production environments.

job_tasks.justification: The job title and numerous responsibilities explicitly detail MLOps functions, including CI/CD, deployment, maintenance, monitoring, and creating reusable deployment infrastructure.
